thread.title: Someone Care to Skin My Model?

post.author: DoV_Tomas
post.body:
Hi guys;

I'm a level designer branching out into modeling and I'm building up my portfolio. I recently built a few models and skinned a couple of them, but I figure it may be better left to someone with more refined skills. I figure this project would be good for an artist looking to pad their own portfolio and I would certainly share the assets to enable this. Here are a few screenies of the model I'd like skinned.






It's a 3DS Max file which I built in Max 7. If you could also uvw unwrap it that would be great, but if not I could do it and provide an image file with the uvw maps ready for painting.

Please contact me through this forum or by email at tbarak@mts.net if you're interested. Everyone is welcome but please be prepared to provide a sample or two. I don't mind working with new people but make sure you have some experience so the end result looks good. If you prefer skinning weapons I'm working on an AK-47 which will be ready for skinning in probably a week or two. Thanks in advance.
